# Data Import and Cleaning
```{r section2}
full_dat <- read_rds("../rds/combined_dataset.rds")

skinny_dat <- full_dat %>% 
  select(EmployeeID, MonthlyIncome, Attrition, JobSatisfaction,

   saveRDS("../shiny/final_shiny_dat.RDS")
```
